titles.title: Small Business Health Care Affordability Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide credits to small businesses and their employees for health insurance coverage.
Small Business Health Care Affordability Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Small Business Health Care Affordability Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain small employers (generally, employers of 50 or fewer employees) and their employees tax credits for health insurance costs.
